blogPost.excerpt: Most scheduling tools put the burden on the recipient. SavvyCal makes it easy for both parties to find the best time to meet—in an instant.
blogPost.body: Most scheduling tools put the burden on the recipient. SavvyCal makes it easy for both parties to find the best time to meet—in an instant.
blogPost.title: SavvyCal - Sending your scheduling link shouldn't feel weird.
blogPost.author: Hiten Shah

localize.description: 大多数日程安排工具都将负担放在收件人身上。SavvyCal让双方很容易找到最佳会面时间-在瞬间。
localize.tagline: 发送您的日程安排链接应该不会觉得奇怪。

localize.description: 大多數日程安排工具都將負擔放在收件人身上。SavvyCal讓雙方很容易找到最佳會面時間-在瞬間。
localize.tagline: 發送您的日程安排鏈接應該不會覺得奇怪。

previous.excerpt: Heartface is a frictionless checkout that enables e-commerce for any product link; letting people shop multiple products from multiple stores without being redirected out of a referring website/app.
previous.title: Heartface - One-click checkout for any product, enabled everywhere 😍

localize.description: Heartface是一种无摩擦的结账方式，可以实现任何产品链接的电子商务；让人们从多家商店购买多个产品，而不会被重新定向到推荐网站/应用程序之外。
localize.tagline: 任何产品均可一键结账，支持Everywhere😍

localize.description: Heartface是一種無摩擦的結賬方式，可以實現任何產品鏈接的電子商務；讓人們從多家商店購買多個產品，而不會被重新定向到推薦網站/應用程序之外。
localize.tagline: 任何產品均可一鍵結賬，支持Everywhere😍

next.excerpt: Statusly is a Slack bot that helps you automate your Slack status and DND/away settings with Powerful Routines. Sync your Google Calendar and Zoom Meetings with your custom routines. For more information visit https://statusly.app/.
next.title: Statusly - Automate Slack status, DND based on your daily routines 🤖

localize.description: Statusly是一款松弛机器人，它通过功能强大的例程帮助您自动执行松弛状态和免打扰/离开设置。将您的Google日历和缩放会议与您的自定义例程同步。欲了解更多信息，请访问https://statusly.app/.。
localize.tagline: 根据您的日常工作🤖自动执行闲置状态和免打扰

localize.description: Statusly是一款鬆弛機器人，它通過功能強大的例程幫助您自動執行鬆弛狀態和免打擾/離開設置。將您的Google日曆和縮放會議與您的自定義例程同步。欲瞭解更多信息，請訪問https://statusly.app/.。
localize.tagline: 根據您的日常工作🤖自動執行閒置狀態和免打擾
